mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, A. * from (select * from mvc_board3 order by bGroup desc, bStep asc) A where rownum <= #{nowPage} * #{amount} ) where rnum > (#{nowPage} - 1) * #{amount}
mapper.update: update mvc_board3 set bName=#{bName}, bTitle=#{bTitle}, bContent=#{bContent} where bId=#{bId}
mapper.insert: insert into mvc_board3 (bId, bName, bTitle, bContent, bGroup, bStep, bIndent) values (mvc_board3_seq.nextval, #{bName}, #{bTitle}, #{bContent}, ${bGroup}, #{bStep}+1, #{bIndent}+1 )
mapper.update: update mvc_board3 set bStep = bStep + 1 where bGroup = #{bGroup} and bStep > #{bStep}
update mvc_board3 set bHit = bHit + 1 where bId = #{bId}
